items.content_html:
It’s 2.25 AM and I have just managed to have my Mastodon instance up and running. Now head to some sleep.

Tomorrow I will be back with the Hometown hack for my Mastodon instance. And probaly a name/domain name for it too.

items.content_html:
The process of learning, being more self-awareness, improvements & being more confident is sometimes painful.

Especially when I have ADD and can’t even explain what is this to the closest peeps.

🤯

items.content_html:
I’m finding a way to delete everything in my Google Photos account 🤔 Why don’t Google just invent a “Delete All” button? 😂 Simplicity is just what people needs.

Think I should backup and delete the whole Google account is better?
